name: WinOptimizer Split Archive Part 1
summary: A PART00000 file is the first part of a split archive created with WinOptimizer, a maintenance and optimization program for Windows. PART00000 files are created by the File Splitter & Joiner tool provided with the program. They can be joined with other parts (i.e., ".part00001," ".part00002," etc.) to restore the original file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
